CustomField.description: This field is used for the BPI request process - replaces the depreciated Google form that was filled out by the Client team
CustomField.label: Type of Batch

value.fullName: BPI_All Batch - (All existing properties NOT on this list will be CANCELLED)
value.label: All Batch - (All existing properties NOT on this list will be CANCELLED)

value.fullName: All Batch - Only Customers in File - (All existing properties NOT on this list will be CANCELLED for the Gil Customers Included in file)
value.label: All Batch - Only Customers in File - (All existing properties NOT on this list will be CANCELLED for the Gil Customers Included in file)

value.fullName: BPI_Change Batch - (Just ADD these properties, leave everything else alone)
value.label: Change Batch - (Just ADD these properties, leave everything else alone)
